title: We Go Up (靑春接力) (Chinese Ver.)
lyrics:
[NCT DREAM "靑春接力" 歌词]
[Verse 1: Jaemin, 
Jeno
, 
Mark
, 
Jisung
]
青春像火柴 意外擦出惊喜style
用小step助跑 
(Say what?)
 喷射出big vibe, keep up 
(Yeah)
Too slow, too fast
 
(Too fast)
 
变速 control
步伐
 
(Come on)
 
加大
 
(Slick)
 
tempo
 
(Uh)
 
加快
要当宇宙最闪的那颗星
灯光熄依旧能wild and free (Wild and free, man)
滑板飘移 舞步嗨翻天 (Prr)
搭上超光速的ride, let's go
Yeah, I know
 
(Uh)
 
看似
 
(What?)
 
遥远的星球
很清晰
 
(So right)
 
最终rendezvous, ha
[Pre-Chorus: Chenle, 
Mark
, 
Haechan
, 
Haechan & Mark
]
举起双手 幻想飞的少年 
(Yeah, we fly)
跌倒也毫不气馁的侧脸 
(What shall I do, man?)
多亏曾经够傻才能如愿
 (Cha-chae)
让这track
去接力新的stage
We go up
[Chorus: All]
We go up, uh, uh, uh, go up
We go up, uh, uh, uh, go up
We go up, uh, we go up
We go up, we go up

[Verse 2: Jeno, 
Mark
, 
Haechan
, 
Jisung
, *Jaemin*]
别发愣 给我ball 节奏对了全凭直觉shot 
(Zoom-zoom)
甜蜜的泡泡糖 
(선껌)
 嚼到只剩包装 
(Uh)
时针暴走
 
(Ay)
 
年轻
 
(Here we go)
 
像泡沫
 
(Uh)
毫不
 
(Ouch)
 
保留
 
(Uh)
 
去play, we go
妄想跟上我燃料满 we don't run out
 
(Oh yeah)
日夜都模糊不停歇才stay alive
*Look time flies,* 
(Time flies)
 *we fly, 等转机 timing
彩蛋会* 
(We dream)
 *上演 everyday, huh*
[Pre-Chorus: Chenle, 
Mark
, 
Renjun
, 
Renjun & Mark
]
迷惘瞬间 想起你的双眼 
(You know why)
那嘲笑我就都听不见 
(Look me in the eye)
球鞋奔往自由的终点线
 
(Cha-chae)
让这track
去接力新的stage
We go up
[Chorus: All]
We go up, uh, uh, uh, go up
We go up, uh, uh, uh, go up
We go up, uh, we go up
We go up, we go up
[Bridge: Haechan, 
Renjun
]
你抬起头 注视着我
攀爬梦想不畏惧太阳
汗泪都融化 还为你歌唱
I need you right here, yeah

[Pre-Chorus: Mark, 
Jisung
, 
Chenle
]
举起双手 幻想飞的少年 (Somewhere in the sky)
跌倒也毫不气馁的侧脸
 (Yeah)
多亏曾经够傻才能如愿
 (We go, yeah, we go)
让这track去接力新的stage
We go up
[Chorus: All]
We go up, uh, uh, uh, go up
We go up, uh, uh, uh, go up
And we go, and we go, we go up
We go up, we go up
